title: powers conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No. 44
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare Act 2021 (Section 14)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare Act 2021 (Section 14) 

(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited social welfare act 2021 (section 14) (commencement) order 2022

title: powers conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No. 44
heading: 2. The 7th day of April 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 14 of
text_raw:
2. The 7th day of April 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 14 of 

the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No. 44 of 2021) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 March, 2022. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [149] 3

title: powers conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No. 44
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the commencement of Section 14 of the Social Welfare 
Act 2021 from 7 April 2022. 

Section 14 provides for a €10 increase in the weekly income thresholds of 
working family payment for all qualifying families. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [149]
